DOC.brief_summary: Multicenter randomised study, on parallel groups to compare recovery of functional amplitude following shoulder dilatation with auto rehabilitation in one group and physiotherapy in the other group.
DOC.criteria: Primary idiopathic phase 2 capsulitis Diagnosis of capsulitis confirmed by shoulder dilatation Patients between 18 and 70 years of age Secondary capsulitis Shoulder pain of other etiology Cognitive disorders Patients less than 18 years, and more than 70 years of age
